title: Xiao Lu He Xiao Lan
synopsis: "Beryl and Sapphire" is a work created by the cartoonist Ocarina. It is serialized on Tencent's animation platform. Its animation of the same name will be broadcast on the whole network in August 2018. The work is loved by readers with a relaxed and funny style. The comics revolve around the gentle and subtle "small green" and the simple and serious "small blue" daily enthusiasm. The robotic article has added a new role to the cute "robot little green". The warmth of the story is filled with the philosophy of life. The ups and downs of the story make you never guess the ending of the story. Source: https://www.bilibili.com/bangumi/media/md97912/
background: Adaption of the comic of the same name by Ocarina.
